review_title: It's a good Place to Work and has good environment . it gives out a quality education .
cons: Nothing down here. It is giving best to Society

pros: People are good, but very small comp
cons: Office is in a old house, no water, proper wash rooms etc

review_title: Working with Government School children is always challenging
pros: A mix of experience and young blood. Never short of new ideas and collaborative actions. It's a challenge to bring everyone under one umbrella but that itself shows the diversity. Immensely talented and ready to go attitude. Perhaps the only Organisation in non-profit segment, which has neither cut salary or thrown anyone out during the covid scenario. Each and every member of CWC are rewarded and gifted for every occasion.
cons: As any other Organisation, there are challenges but everything gets sorted out with mutual discussion.

pros: It provides an excellent platform to learn and expose.
cons: Need to improvements in mutual repect

review_title: The best NGO To work with both teachers and students
pros: Very challenging work.. New learnings with each project.
Will be learning new things everyday
